overview: A teenager, Kashaf lives with his mother, Rosnah who works as a GRO and his brother, Shamim a college student. They live in a flat in Kuala Lumpur. Kashaf worked delivering drugs after dropping out of middle school. One day, Kashaf was beaten to a serious injury and he was in a coma. During the coma he could see everything going on around him but people could not see him, as if he was dead but only one person could see him, namely Imani. He asked for help from Imani to inform his family of his condition and help save his brother from the scene of immorality.
title: Kashaf Imani
